ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am Ellinsar, a 6-ish level wood elf Druid. I spend the majority of my time over in the Steamfont Mountains... so Luana, I can tell you that in the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I am Ellinsar, a 6-ish level wood elf Druid. I spend the majority of my
time over in the Steamfont Mountains... so Luana, I can tell you that
in the Steamfonts, in the second of the 3 windmills, is a merchant who
sells ore a-plenty. Sharpening stones, too.. for those interested.

Ellinsar

> Argh, where is a smith to find the ore to ply her
> trade? If any Bristlebane citizens would be so kind
> as to share this information I would be indebted.
>
> Luana
>
